COVID-19 Effect on NBA Players

4 Aug 2020

Here is a tracker of how NBA players have performed after testing positive for COVID-19. There is evidence that COVID-19 may have long lasting effects. This may include high-level sports performance. It should be noted that there are likely many confounding factors to players‚Äô performance, including living in a ‚Äúbubble‚Äù and 4 months of deconditioning.
